text: Nneyo peyo numbe mmanganya mmangwendo nkundanje inkubhalanjilwanga na bhanangulungwa bha makanisha. Mmanganya mmowenji mwiitimalikanje nnijangutilananga, pabha Majandiko ga ukonjelo gakuti. “A Nnungu bhanakwaataukanga bhandunji bha kwiipuna, ikabheje bhanakwapanganga nema bhakwiitimalikanga.”
